alert.note: Alert for Linn (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 09 at 6:26PM CDT until May 09 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LINN...SOUTHWESTERN HENRY AND BATES COUNTIES... At 625 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Archie to near Butler to near Rich Hill, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Butler, Adrian, Rich Hill, Drexel, Montrose, Hume, Amsterdam, Amoret, Rockville, Foster, Merwin, Passaic, Worland, Ballard and Hartwell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
